A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Mary Poppins in Space? Come on!!!!! A secondary subplot that added nothing to the story\, a poor second part film to a trilogy. A heroic sacrifice that gets sabotaged  A LOT of man-shaming going on in this film.... we are supposed to belive that Rose is that good at everything? I mean she was a janitor on the freighter! The female leads are bad ass and empowered but the males are written to be arrogant buffoons. I see an unbalanced Social Justice spin to this movie.  The Rose-Finn subplot seemed like filler and anti-capitalist propoganda.
